name: LOTUS EATER PRINCESS - Book 1 1/2
description:
This is version 1.01 of the game, released on July 21st, 2022. Check the README.txt to see a list of changes. You may want to play the FIRST GAME before playing this one.

STORY
Elena and Ciara have just started their summer vacations, and they decide to spend it well by playing a MMO together!

GAMEPLAY
A short 1-2 hour long turn-based RPG with a few VN segments. Killing enemies nets you experience and maybe even some items! Fishing minigame included.

CREDITS
MUSIC and SOUND EFFECTS
M-ART -  TAM Music Factory  - G2-MIDI - soleil-musique - FREEDOM HOUSE - windsphere

GRAPHICS
First Seed Material - 白螺子屋
